displayName: Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse
rationale: Preventing password reuse increases account resiliency against brute force login attempts.
recommended_action:
Perform the following to set the password policy as prescribed:
Via AWS Console
1. Login to AWS Console (with appropriate permissions to View Identity Access
Management Account Settings)
2. Go to IAM Service on the AWS Console
3. Click on Account Settings on the Left Pane
4. Check 'Prevent password reuse'
 5. Set 'Number of passwords to remember' is set to 24
error_message: IAM password policy does not properly restrict password reuse
ruleNames: Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse
